Statement.Sql: select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort from FIELD_VALUE v, FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=g.mFieldId and mTable=? and mKey=? order by v.mCreated desc

select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort from FIELD_VALUE v, FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=g.mFieldId and mTable=? and mKey=? and v.mFieldId=? order by v.mCreated desc

select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort from FIELD_VALUE v, FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where mTable=? and mKey=? and v.mId IN (select max(mId) from FIELD_VALUE group by mKey,mFieldId) and f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=g.mFieldId
